subsections.title: Milestones in AI Development
subsections.summary: This subsection explores the significant advancements in artificial intelligence, focusing on key milestones, the development of neural networks, the rise of expert systems, and the evolution of machine learning.

subsections.title: Key Milestones in AI Development
subsections.summary: A chronological overview of the most notable achievements in AI, highlighting the pioneering work and breakthroughs that have shaped the field.

subsections.title: The Evolution of Neural Networks
subsections.summary: Exploring the development of neural networks, from their inception inspired by the human brain to their current applications in deep learning and artificial intelligence.

subsections.title: The Rise of Expert Systems
subsections.summary: Discussing the emergence of expert systems, their role in decision-making processes, and their impact on various industries, including medicine, finance, and engineering.

subsections.title: The Evolution of Machine Learning
subsections.summary: Tracing the history of machine learning, from early statistical methods to advanced techniques like supervised and unsupervised learning, and its application in modern AI.
